text: The England football team are a team who play football for England. They play their matches in England at Wembley Stadium. They played their first game in 1872 against Scotland. They won the FIFA World Cup in 1966 when they beat West Germany by 4 goals to 2 at the old Wembley Stadium. == Most appearances == # Name Career Caps Goals 1 Peter Shilton 1970–1990 125 0 2 Wayne Rooney 2003–2018 120 53 3 David Beckham 1996–2009 115 17 4 Steven Gerrard 2000–2014 114 21 5 Bobby Moore 1962–1973 108 2 6 Ashley Cole 2001–2014 107 0 7 Bobby Charlton 1958–1970 106 49 Frank Lampard 1999–2014 106 29 9 Billy Wright 1946–1959 105 3 10 Bryan Robson 1980–1991 90 26 == Top scorers == # Name Career Goals Caps Average 2 Wayne Rooney 2003–2018 53 120 0.4416 3 Bobby Charlton 1958–1970 49 106 0.4622 4 Gary Lineker 1984–1992 48 80 0.6000 1 Harry Kane 2015- 66 98 0.7142 5 Jimmy Greaves 1959–1967 44 57 0.7719 6 Michael Owen 1998–2008 40 89 0.4494 7 Nat Lofthouse 1950–1958 30 33 0.9090 Alan Shearer 1992–2000 30 63 0.4762 Tom Finney 1946–1958 30 76 0.3947 10 Vivian Woodward 1903–1911 29 23 1.2609 Frank Lampard 1999–2014 29 106 0.2735 == Honours == ; Olympic football tournament * Gold medal (2): 1908, 1912 ; FIFA World Cup * Winner (1): 1966 * Fourth Place (2): 1990, 2018 ; UEFA European Championship * Runners-up (1): 2020, 2024 * Third Place (1): 1968 * Semi-finals (1): 1996 ; UEFA Nations League * Third Place (1): 2018 -19 ; British Championship * Winners (54) (including 20 shared) == Recent Games == Date Type of Game Home Team Result Away Team 27 March 2018 Friendly 1–1 2 June 2018 Friendly 2–1 7 June 2018 Friendly 2–0 18 June 2018 2018 FIFA World Cup Group G 1–2 24 June 2018 2018 FIFA World Cup Group G 6–1 28 June 2018 2018 FIFA World Cup Group G 0–1 3 July 2018 2018 FIFA World Cup R16 1–1 (3–4p) 7 July 2018 2018 FIFA World Cup QF 0–2 11 July 2018 2018 FIFA World Cup SF 2–1 (aet) 14 July 2018 2018 FIFA World Cup 3rd 2–0 * Green means that the team won. * Yellow means the team had a draw. * Red means the team lost. == Minor tournaments == Year Round Position GP W D* L GS GA 1964 Taça de Nações Group Stage 3rd 3 0 1 2 2 7 1976 U.S.A.
